book.synopsis: In the sequel to the hit film Pitch Black, Riddick, now an escaped convict and fugitive, becomes caught in the middle of a fierce galactic war between two powerful forces. Original. (A Universal Pictures film, written and directed by David Twohy, releasing June 2004, starring Vin Diesel, Judi Dench, Colm Feore, & Alexa Davalos) (Science Fiction & Fantasy)
